lmui

A strict, minimal, semantic-first UI component library with zero dependencies. Semantic tags and attributes are styled out of the box with few classes, thereby forcing best practices. Components with dynamic behaviour are WebComponents.

Browse components Get started

Lightweight

~00KB CSS, ~00KB JS minified + gzipped.

Zero dependencies

Fully-standalone with no dependencies on any JS or CSS frameworks. Components with dynamic behaviour are self-contained vanilla-Javascript WebComponents.

Semantic HTML

Native elements like <button>, <input>, <dialog> and semantic attributes like role="button" are styled directly. No classes.

Accessibility

Semantic HTML and ARIA roles are used (and forced in many places) throughout. Full keyboard navigation support for all components and elements.

Themes

Easily customize the overall theme using CSS custom properties. data-theme="dark" on body automatically uses the bundled dark theme.
